name: Telivy
headline: Automate your cyber security risk assessments
description: Telivy helps small and medium businesses purchase the best cyber insurance coverage. Our proprietary ML-based risk platform assesses insurability gaps, offers remediation plans and brokers insurance quotes from A+ rated carriers.

founders.name: Naren Sathiya, Founder
founders.description: Naren is interested in the intersection of finance and technology, and views the insurance industry as a data science problem to be optimized on. He joined Hippo Insurance as an early engineer and led its embedded distribution channel with homebuilders, which became over 20% of its revenue within 1.5 years. He hopes to build similar workflows and user experience for the commercial industry, starting with cyber and compliance companies. In his free time, he likes to mountain bike, swim and hike.

# Experience the industry's leading Cybersecurity Risk Discovery Platform
Easy to deploy and a one stop shop for Attack Surface Management
[Get a Free Scan](https://www.telivy.com/<https:/portal.telivy.com/start/d3598383-29ea-488b-8373-a219cca301d7>)[Book a Demo](https://www.telivy.com/<#book-a-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673fa704a495776b3c065643_Group%203.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673fa73932993c772c14b29c_Group%206.avif)
## Trusted by over 150 MSPs and vCISOs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/6567a45ced2d11230a8a7c29_Stability-networks-logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/6567a45c96487f451012e97f_Reciprocal-logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f217ada9abc4c71d37b4b_virtual-sprout-logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f218d2ec0cf7e16b2065e_5th-Gear-Final-Logo-Horizontal.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f21b2f3c716e7f7d0f31d_Picture1.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f21c847f8bf0de626d3cc_nbit.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f21d747f8bf0de626e0f3_image%20110.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f21e7c9b5509fd0124be0_Group.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f21fdeee56d31c59b5f2f_image%20111.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f22c1ea7f07665633eefc_image%20108.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f22cf9bb77f96fd718b5c_image%20129.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f22e55214c15d986bfcaa_navita.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f22f9d22be86edfb8e3e5_image%20107.svg)
## Comprehensive Risk Discovery & Attack Surface Management
Single pane of glass for your security needs
### Network & devices
Remotely identify all assets and vulnerabilities
### SaaS Applications
IAM via M365 and Google Workspace
### Dark Web
Identify stolen passwords and identities 
### PII & data security
Offer visibility into how PII data is being stored and transmitted 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f24b4a558d496db8f16d2_Group%201000001804.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f30ac2438976722480b7c_Group%201000001805.avif)
## Industry specific on-demand client ready reports
Quantify the impact of a weak security posture via Financial Calculator
Share reports easily with prospects and existing clients
Distilled Insights that are easy to understand
## Automate Security Operations
Easy to setup via powerscript on Windows and Mac
Flexible deployment options across cloud, client and external scan
Get notified on critical alerts
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f3422147299d3bf5dc216_Frame%201000001801.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f34e28053b345fae9d2c8_Group%203%20\(1\).avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e251dff9486e070ea6975/673f356d18e293fcf341b932_Group%206.avif)
## What our users have to say
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e2674eba1467be9732dd3/673f523b2bd347a3b85c4abd_Rectangle%201010.png)
Tom Wooley
CEO, Today Cybersecurity
We need visibility into the status of our client's networks, vulnerabilities, security postures, and potential threats. There's a lot of different software that is currently doing this, but Telivy has brought it all together in an easy to use & understand dashboard that analyses multiple data sources.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e2674eba1467be9732dd3/673f51f32a2baf15dc0da388_Rectangle%20566.png)
Jason Smith
ZATIS Technology Group
“Telivy is a game changer that allows me to focus on what's most important, trusting them with handling the busy work of cybersecurity risk assessments.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e2674eba1467be9732dd3/673f51cac6c2ef93eae7395e_Rectangle%20563.png)
Steven C.
Head of Operations, [Level 5 Management](https://www.telivy.com/<#>)
“Their external domain scanning works really well, they find things I didn't even know were there. We use their product to show our customers gaps and risks to their business and it helps us to grow our business.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e2674eba1467be9732dd3/673f5167015a4b831f72a378_Rectangle%20562.png)
Raffi J.
CEO, [Triada Networks](https://www.telivy.com/<#>)
“The truth is that there is no single tool that solves the assessment product. And putting together a report with disparate tools in a successful way is painful and time consuming. Telivy streamlines that process.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e2674eba1467be9732dd3/673f512feefd6e3bbc2498d3_Rectangle%20561.png)
Stephen Holt
Chief Operations Officer, [Holt Data Solutions](https://www.telivy.com/<#>)
“Telivy saved one of my clients nearly 65% on cyber insurance. Their scanning solution is great and helped us secure all of our client’s networks.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600e2674eba1467be9732dd3/673f523b2bd347a3b85c4abd_Rectangle%201010.png)

generated_description:
**Telivy: Streamlining Cybersecurity for SMBs**

Founded in 2021 and backed by Y Combinator (Batch S21), Telivy is a San Francisco-based startup that’s shaking up the cybersecurity landscape for small and medium businesses. Its mission? To automate cyber security risk assessments and make it easier for these companies to manage their cybersecurity needs. 

Initially, Telivy focused on helping SMBs navigate the often murky waters of cyber insurance. Their proprietary machine learning-based risk platform identifies insurability gaps, provides clear remediation plans, and connects clients with quotes from A+ rated insurance carriers. It’s a one-stop-shop approach, simplifying what can often be an overwhelming process.

As of now, Telivy boasts a lean team of six and is led by Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer. They've earned trust and recognition in the industry, being relied upon by over 150 Managed Service Providers (MSPs) and virtual Chief Information Security Officers (vCISOs). Their current offerings provide comprehensive risk discovery and attack surface management, covering everything from network vulnerabilities to dark web monitoring.

Users rave about Telivy’s intuitive dashboard, which aggregates data from various sources, giving cybersecurity professionals the oversight they need without the hassle of juggling multiple tools. For many, it’s become a game-changer that frees them up to focus on critical security operations rather than getting stuck in tedious, time-consuming assessments.

Notably, Telivy is also making strides toward expansion, as evidenced by their recent acquisition by Cytracom. This move reflects not only the platform's value but also the growing need for robust cybersecurity solutions.

For businesses looking for a reliable partner in cybersecurity risk management, Telivy stands out as an innovative choice. Curious to see how it works? Check out their website to book a demo or start with a free scan: [telivy.com](https://www.telivy.com/).
